address: Sukhumvit 49, Khlong Toei Nuea, Vadhana, Bangkok 10110
description:
The Alcove 49 Sukhumvit 49 is a low-rise Bangkok condo for sale that was built in 2009.
This Bangkok condo for sale on Sukhumvit 49 comprises one building having 55 apartments on 8 floors
Harmony Metropolitan Living in The Alcove 49
The Alcove 49 is a condominium that combines the harmony of a central location in Thong Lo, a pristine landscape, and a superior lifestyle.
Located in Sukhumvit soi 49, only 5 minutes from BTS Thong Lo, the location offers residents superior commuting convenience for both leisure and business.
Surrounded by the vibrant neighborhood of Little Tokyo, and a stone’s throw from Thong Lo, the development covers an array of amenities ranging from hospitals, International schools, supermarkets, and a variety of cafes and restaurants.
Landscaped especially for residents who wish to escape the buzz and bustle of city life, the development has put careful consideration into the selection of trees, plants, and other green elements featured in the development. The highlight of the pristine landscape is the common courtyard at the center of the development.

address: Soi Charoen Chai, Khlong Toei Nuea, Vadhana, Bangkok 10110
description:
Ceil by Sansiri Ekkamai 12 condo for sale in Bangkok was developed in 2016 by Sansiri PCL.
This Bangkok condominium comprises 3 buildings, having 376 apartments on 17 floors. Total project area - 5,992 m2
detail:
Harmony of living in Ekkamai-Thong Lo
Located at Ekkamai 12, only 15 minutes from BTS Thong Lo and BTS Ekkamai, the location offers residents superior commuting convenience for both leisure and business.
Surrounded by the vibrant neighborhood of Little Tokyo, and a stone’s throw from Thong Lo, the development covers an array of amenities ranging from hospitals, International schools, supermarkets, and a variety of cafes and restaurants.
Landscaped especially for residents who wish to escape the buzz and bustle of city life, the development has put careful consideration into the selection of trees, plants, and other green elements featured in the development. The highlight of the pristine landscape is the common courtyard at the center of the development.
